# The New Zealand Soil Classification {#sec-nzsc123}

Classifying a profile according to the NZSC [@hewitt2024] requires the following steps:

-   Identify diagnostic features
-   Follow the Key to Soil Orders
-   Follow the Keys to Group and Subgroup

## Identifying Diagnostic features

The descriptive parameters that help define the NZSC Diagnostic features are outlined in @tbl-nzsc-diags; see [-@hewitt2024] for the full definitions. Any or all of the listed parameters may be required for a confident diagnosis.

| Anthropic Soils  | Evidence of profile truncation (compare site with surrounding landform(s))                                                     |

| Organic Soils    |                                                                                                                                |

| Gley Soils       | -   [Buried horizons](in_01_horizon_names.html#sec-hzn-bur)                                                                    |
